title

options.systemMessage:
=You are a growth-focused AI content strategist for an AI automation company.

Inputs:
{{ $json.articles[0].title }},{{ $json.articles[0].content }}

Your task:
Using the provided tech automation trends, generate ONE unique YouTube Shorts video idea.

Rules:
- The idea must show a real business pain point
- Clearly show how automation saves time, cost, or effort
- Do NOT mention tools or platforms
- The idea must feel practical and realistic
- The idea must subtly position the company as the solution


Output format:
{
  "video_idea": "",
  "target_business": "",
  "core_pain": "",
  "automation_benefit": ""
}

You are a professional short-form video scriptwriter for AI automation companies.

Using the provided video idea:
- Write a 60-second YouTube Shorts script
- Keep sentences short and impactful
- Include natural dialogues or narration
- Focus on before vs after automation
- No technical jargon
- Business-friendly language

Output format:
{
  "hook": "",
  "full_script": "",
  "cta": ""
}

=You are an expert cinematic prompt engineer for Veo3.
 
input:  {{ $json.output }}

Task:
Using the provided script, generate 8 scene-level cinematic video prompts.

Rules:
- Each scene must visually continue the story
- Each scene duration: ~7–8 seconds
- Include environment, lighting, camera movement
- Include on-screen dialogue or narration text
- Corporate, modern, realistic visuals
- No fantasy or abstract scenes

Output format:
{
  "scene_1": { "prompt": "", "dialogue": "" },
  "scene_2": { "prompt": "", "dialogue": "" },
  ...
  "scene_8": { "prompt": "", "dialogue": "" }
}

json.query: latest AI automation trends helping businesses save time and cost

results.content: Using AI technologies, companies can improve efficiency by reducing labor ai reduce cost and increasing the speed at which tasks are completed.

results.title: How Artificial Intelligence Will Transform Businesses
results.content: Companies are using AI to optimize inventory levels, plan efficient delivery routes, predict supply chain disruptions, and automate warehouse

results.title: Real-world gen AI use cases from the world's leading organizations

json.prompt 1: A mid-30s professional, male or female, sits hunched in a modern corporate office cubicle. Harsh, draining fluorescent lighting. The camera starts with a medium shot, then rapidly pans across multiple open browser tabs on a large monitor: CRM, ad platform, analytics, spreadsheet. The employee rapidly clicks between tabs, their expression growing increasingly strained and frustrated. Visual elements: stacks of reports on desk, coffee cup. | Still manually digging through data every week? Drowning in tabs and spreadsheets? Every Monday, it's the same routine. Hours lost.
json.prompt 2: Same corporate office environment, still under harsh lighting. A tight, slightly shaky handheld close-up focuses on the employee's fingers. They are rapidly copying data from one spreadsheet cell and pasting it into another, then hitting 'refresh' repeatedly on a web page. A fast-spinning clock graphic briefly overlays the screen in the corner. The employee lets out a frustrated sigh, running a hand through their hair, emphasizing exhaustion. | Manually pulling numbers from every platform. Copying, pasting, refreshing. You're building reports, not driving strategy. Missed deadlines. Human errors.
json.prompt 3: The camera executes a slow, mournful dolly zoom out from the employee's overwhelmed face to reveal a cluttered desk with multiple monitors displaying jumbled, dense, unorganized data. Overall dimming lighting, creating a sense of confinement and stress. The employee slumps back in their chair, head in hands, the visible weight of the work crushing them. | And that crushing feeling of wasted time. This isn't just tedious. It's a drag on your business.
json.prompt 4: A static wide shot of the employee at their desk, looking defeated and contemplative. Lighting is muted, suggesting a lack of clarity. A prominent, stark text overlay appears on screen: 'Manual Data = Missed Opportunities & Wasted Hours.' The employee stares blankly at the complex, overwhelming data on their screen, the text overlay reinforcing the negative impact. | Slow insights mean delayed decisions. And a real hit to your competitive edge.
json.prompt 5: A smooth, steady crane shot lifts over the same employee, who is now visibly relaxed and calm. The environment has transitioned to a bright, modern open-plan office bathed in soft, inviting natural light streaming through large windows. The employee sips coffee, casually glancing at a single, clean, dynamic dashboard displayed on a large, wall-mounted screen. A faint smile of relief crosses their face. | Imagine this instead: One clear, intuitive dashboard. All your critical data, flowing automatically.
json.prompt 6: Within the same bright, modern office, a dynamic, energetic close-up tracking shot follows the employee as they smoothly navigate the intuitive dashboard interface on a sleek tablet. Seamless, real-time data visualizations update fluidly on the larger screen behind them. The lighting is even and highlights clarity. The employee effortlessly scrolls through charts and graphs, the data appearing instantly, clearly, with no unnecessary clicks or tabs. | Real-time insights, right at your fingertips. No manual effort. No more endless tabs. Just clarity.
json.prompt 7: A stable medium shot in a modern collaborative huddle space. Bright, focused lighting illuminates the screen and the employee. The employee confidently nods, makes a quick, decisive note on their tablet, and points to a key trend on the dashboard with a look of proactive understanding. A clean, impactful text overlay appears: 'Unlock Instant, Accurate Insights. Make Data-Driven Decisions in Minutes, Not Hours. Gain Your Competitive Edge.' | You see trends instantly. You make data-driven decisions in minutes, not hours. Shift your focus from data entry to strategic growth.
json.prompt 8: A wide, sweeping dolly shot in a sleek, modern conference room or collaborative workspace. The now confident employee stands at the head of a table, leading an impactful discussion with colleagues, gesturing emphatically to a large screen displaying simplified, actionable insights. Professional, bright, and empowering lighting. The employee maintains eye contact with colleagues, exuding confidence and leadership. The scene concludes with a clear call to action on screen. | Empower your teams. Outpace the competition. It's time to work smarter, not harder. Ready to transform your data insights? Click the link to discover how AI automation can unlock your business potential!

json.output:
```json
{
  "video_idea": "Title: Stop Drowning in Data! 

**Visuals:** 
**Scene 1 (Pain):** Start with a rapid-cut montage: a visibly frustrated employee (e.g., in marketing, sales, or operations) juggling multiple open browser tabs (CRM, ad platform, analytics tool, spreadsheet). Quick close-ups of them manually copying and pasting numbers, hitting refresh, sighing, and looking overwhelmed by endless data entry for a weekly performance report. Show a clock spinning rapidly or a 'time passed' graphic to emphasize hours spent.

**Scene 2 (Transition):** A brief, stark shot of a messy desk with piles of paper or jumbled data on screens. Text overlay appears: 'Manual Data = Missed Opportunities & Wasted Hours.'

**Scene 3 (Automation Benefit):** Smooth transition to the *same employee*, now looking calm and confident, sipping coffee. They casually glance at a single, clean, dynamic dashboard on a large screen or tablet. Data is flowing seamlessly, charts are updating in real-time. They nod decisively, perhaps making a quick note, and immediately move to a strategic discussion with a colleague, looking proactive and prepared. Text overlay appears: 'Unlock Instant, Accurate Insights. Make Data-Driven Decisions in Minutes, Not Hours. Gain Your Competitive Edge.'

**Ending:** A quick shot of the confident employee leading a brief, impactful discussion, implying that their time is now spent on strategy rather than compilation. The overall feeling is one of clarity, speed, and strategic advantage.",
  "target_business": "Medium to large businesses with sales, marketing, or operations departments reliant on cross-platform data for reporting and decision-making.",
  "core_pain": "Excessive time and effort spent on manual data aggregation, reporting, and analysis from disparate sources, leading to delayed insights, human error, and hindered strategic decision-making.",
  "automation_benefit": "Achieve instant, accurate, and consolidated data insights, dramatically reducing reporting time, eliminating manual effort, and empowering rapid, data-driven strategic decisions for a significant competitive advantage."
}
```

output.title: Stop Drowning in Data! Automate Your Reports & Get Instant Insights 📊
output.description:
Tired of endless hours spent manually compiling data? 😩 If your sales, marketing, or operations teams are struggling with disparate data sources, delayed insights, and human error, it's time for a change!

This short shows how data automation can transform your business. From overwhelmed to empowered, see how you can achieve instant, accurate, and consolidated insights. Drastically reduce reporting time, eliminate manual effort, and make rapid, data-driven strategic decisions.

Unlock your competitive edge and shift your focus from data entry to strategic growth! #DataAutomation #BusinessEfficiency

Drastically reduce reporting time, eliminate manual effort, and make rapid, data-driven strategic decisions.\n\nUnlock your competitive edge and shift your focus from data entry to strategic growth! #DataAutomation #BusinessEfficiency",
